title: Manifestly Checklists
description: Simplify your recurring workflows. Manifestly is a checklist based system with conditional logic, reminders, role based assignments, and automations to help manage recurring tasks for IT, HR, Property Managers, Marketing, and Realtor teams. Slack, Microsoft Teams, and Salesforce integrations along with an open API and advanced web hook capabilities to integrate with any system on the internet ensures your team never misses a thing.
